mapper.insert: insert into tbl_buy_work (member_profile_id, work_id, work_send_status) values (#{memberProfileId}, #{workId}, #{workSendStatus})
mapper.select: select bw.id, bw.work_send_status,bw.work_id , w.work_price, bw_mp.profile_name, bw_mp.profile_email from tbl_buy_work bw join tbl_work w on bw.work_id = w.id join tbl_post p on w.id = p.id and w.id = #{workPostId} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bw_mp on bw.member_profile_id = bw_mp.id order by w.id desc limit #{mySettingTablePagination.startRow}, #{mySettingTablePagination.rowCount};

select count(*) from tbl_buy_work bw join tbl_work w on bw.work_id = w.id join tbl_post p on w.id = p.id and w.id = #{workPostId} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bw_mp on bw.member_profile_id = bw_mp.id

select bw_mp.member_id, bw.id, bw.work_id, p.post_title, w.genre_type, p.created_date, p.post_content, m.profile_img_url, mp.profile_nickname, w.work_price, fl.file_name as thumbnailFileName ,fl.file_path as thumbnailFilePath from tbl_buy_work bw join tbl_work w on bw.work_id = w.id join tbl_post p on w.id = p.id and p.post_type = #{postType} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bw_mp on bw.member_profile_id = bw_mp.id join tbl_member bw_m on bw_mp.member_id = bw_m.id and bw_m.id = #{memberId} join tbl_file fl on w.thumbnail_file_id = fl.id order by w.id desc limit #{myWorkAndFundingPagination.startRow}, #{myWorkAndFundingPagination.rowCount};

select count(*) from tbl_buy_work bw join tbl_work w on bw.work_id = w.id join tbl_post p on w.id = p.id and p.post_type = #{postType} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bw_mp on bw.member_profile_id = bw_mp.id join tbl_member bw_m on bw_mp.member_id = bw_m.id and bw_m.id = #{memberId}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_buy_work where id = #{id}; -- 내가 구매한 작품 내역 삭제하는 것
